attributes.additional_details:
We should hold our Government to account and have the offenders given real justice and not the slap on the wrist,that they get at the moment.
We should petition D.Cameron to get his finger out of his ear and change the law now to give a real deterrent by punishing offenders with a proper punishment to fit the crime.
We have listened to the Civil Liberty Groups and Liberal Lefties for far too long.It is time that the majority was heard and the government represented the majority.
The Hunting Law was pushed through into Law so let's do the same with harder sentences,especially for juveniles who are walking from the courts today,knowing that we can not touch them after the rioting this week.Also stop giving them anonimity.Name and shame them in all the papers.Let the people see who these thugs are.
